articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Shanghai records hottest day in May in 100 years - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Temperature hits 36.7C in China’s largest city as records fall across Southeast Asia and South Asia.
articles.content:
Shanghai has recorded its hottest day in May in 100 years at 36.7C (98F), shattering the previous high by a full degree.
Scientists say global warming is exacerbating adverse weather with many count… [+2390 chars]
